source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, wide shot of a street, likely in New Orleans, on a foggy, overcast day. The stone sidewalk is wet, and colorful buildings with balconies line the right side of the street, where a large Penske rental truck and other vehicles are parked. A few pedestrians are strolling along the sidewalk next to a tall, black metal fence.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a static, wide shot of a street, likely in New Orleans, on a foggy, overcast day. The stone sidewalk is wet, and colorful buildings with balconies line the right side of the street, where a large Penske rental truck and other vehicles are parked. A few pedestrians are strolling along the sidewalk next to a tall, black metal fence.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly focuses on describing the static scenery, such as the street, buildings, parked truck, and weather, instead of the motion of the subjects as required by the instructions. The description of the pedestrians' movement is too general ("strolling"), and the caption includes a speculative phrase ("likely in New Orleans"), which is forbidden. The caption should be revised to describe only the motion of the people, stating that a couple walks along the sidewalk from right to left, followed by another individual walking in the same direction.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A couple walks along a sidewalk from right to left, followed by another individual walking in the same direction.
